name: Mine Rush (itch) (Gutterpunk)
description:
Mine Rush is a puzzle game inspired both by cave digging puzzle games from the '80s, but also by cave digging action game of the 2000s'.

There is currently 200 levels in the game, and more coming, I am generating them as fast as I can. Each levels have been generated automatically, scored by comparing it's solutions to every other caves, which are all verified to be solvable. I intend to include 400 when launched in the Android app store.

The game itself will be 100% free, with ads to get to see the solutions for the caves.

Instructions:

  1. Grab all the red diamonds to be allowed to get the Exit star. Try to do it on or under the PAR, but nothing forces you too at the beginning.
  2. Move by dragging the hero, or click-drag around the screen. It's easier to click on the hero.
  3. Grab nearby objects (diamond, dirt, or push boulders) by touching them when standing next to them. This saves a step in many situations.

Known bugs:

  • Sometime the controls get stuck inexplicably. It is linked to using the Timeline bar while moving
  • There is a lot of prompts missing (like a tutorial)
  • No sound off button
  • Some of the solutions aren't the minimal one. I am thinking of implementing a "community solution" option, but for now most caves are ok.
